channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The druggies who continue to harass Colegrove Road emptied the rubbish bins on Sunday night/morning, 4th February
item.description:
Dirty nappies, food waste and other items strewn up the road are causing health and safety concerns. Can someone clean this up please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willowbrook Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dislodged Paving Slab, 4th February
item.description:
LONDON BUSES REPORTING States paving slab half way in to roadway - danger if driven over unable to raise CCTV Stop No 13287 Dangerous to pedestrians with impaired sight.

item.title: Blocked drain, 4th February
item.description:
Previously reported and closed ref 8729730 The water is going into residents garage and is coming from a drain on the pavement which Thames water say belongs to council this needs further investigation
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, West Heath, Greater London

item.title: Outside 26 Stafford Road DA14 6PU, 4th February
item.description:
The light has been out since an electric car charger was installed. My daughter comes home at 5.00am in the morning after working a night shift and it is pitch black making it dangerous for a woman on her own and she doesn't drive and also dangerous due to uneven pavements. Please can the lamppost be sorted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Stafford Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant littering from cars, 4th February
item.description:
Cars dumping their litter on Ronald’s road. The fence line of 8 Aldermary seems to attract littering regularly- Road is meant to be swept every Monday yet there’s been rubbish there for weeks, particularly broken glass in the road gulley. Road sweeping machines are ineffective at tackling this issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ronalds Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of rubbish on pavement, 4th February
item.description:
Been left since at least Saturday 31st Jan 2026. Outside 16 Dupree Road. Large amount of rubbish cluttering the sidewalk and slowly spreading. People are unable to use this side of the sidewalk due to the mess and are having to walk in the road.

item.title: Water gushing out of pipe, can not be switched off, 4th February
item.description:

item.title: Ongoing leak - water coming out of pavement, 4th February
item.description:
